name: Fromage Frenzy 2
description:
Straight into hell from being burnt out, it's an Unreal Blueprints game! This is a sequel technically to a previous game I made in a team called Fromage Frenzy. The reason for this is that this was the original idea for the game, and I could reuse the art for this. It's a basic endless runner, a lot of potential, not enough time.

A and D to move, spacebar to jump.
